articles.author: Joe Snell, Andrea Sachs
articles.title: Video shows passenger opening plane door during Asiana Airlines flight - The Washington Post
articles.description: In footage that appeared to have been captured by a passenger, wind could be seen whipping into the plane’s cabin, battering passengers.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
Comment
A passenger caused chaos on an Asiana Airlines flight over South Korea on Friday by opening a door, injuring at least 12 people, who were treated for breathing problem… [+2448 chars]
